qas.question: What is one popular wrestling film?
What award was The Wrestler nominated for?
What are the names of a couple wrestling documentaries?

answers.text: Beyond the Mat directed by Barry W. Blaustein, and Wrestling with Shadows

qas.question: Where does wrestling keep coming up as a subject?

answers.text: in both academia and the media

context: Due to its persistent cultural presence and to its novelty within the performing arts, wrestling constitutes a recurring topic <a3_0>in both academia and the media<a3_0/>. Several documentaries have been produced looking at professional wrestling, most notably, <a2_0>Beyond the Mat directed by Barry W. Blaustein, and Wrestling with Shadows<a2_0/> featuring wrestler Bret Hart and directed by Paul Jay. There have also been many fictional depictions of wrestling; the <a0_0>2008 film The Wrestler<a0_0/> received <a1_0>several Oscar nominations<a1_0/> and began a career revival for star Mickey Rourke.
